quest.name: Deeper into the Maze
journal: Alphinaud is gazing into the Archeion with an appraising look.
objectives: Speak to people outside the Archeion.
Move to the designated location, and sedate the target with the sleeping dart.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Were you caught in mist on your way here? The sprayers keep the air humid, so the habitat feels as close as possible to a natural forest.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: This is the foremost material archive in Sharlayan. I should love to explore its treasures shelf by shelf, but I fear we have little time for such indulgences.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Don't worry about me, I'm hale and healthy! In fact, I'm beginning to suspect that...

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: ...Nay, let's discuss this later. The investigation demands our undivided attention.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, we won't learn anything of value standing out here. Let us proceed into the main building and speak with the custodian.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Greetings. We are here to peruse the Archeion's vaults.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEARCHEION
dialogue.text: Peruse? You are clearly not gleaners, then. Might I ask your affiliation?

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: We belong to the Students of Baldesion, but...is that relevant? I was given to believe that the vaults─those open to the public, at least─were...open to the public.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEARCHEION
dialogue.text: Ordinarily, yes, that would be the case. At present, however, access is restricted. Only persons directly involved in the reorganization efforts are permitted to enter.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Not us, then. I suppose we had better move along to another facility.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: This building has a lift which connects to the middle tier, yes? Might we at least make use of that?

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEARCHEION
dialogue.text: That service has also been suspended, I am afraid. For the time being, priority has been given over to the conveyance of inventory.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What, so this is as far as we can go!?

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEARCHEION
dialogue.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Please come again after our restructuring operation is concluded.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: By that time, it will be too late. And we were so close to getting answers...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: We need to rethink our approach. Let us step outside for the moment, shall we?

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEARCHEION
dialogue.text: ...Students of Baldesion. Hmph.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Forum must be wary of exposure indeed to so heavily restrict the use of public institutions...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If they're going to close off facilities, then they ought to announce it! The students must be furious!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Labyrinthos is constructed in the shape of a mortar. This upper layer is called the “Outer Circuit,” and the “Medial Circuit” lies one tier below us...

dialogue.name: TIREDSTAFF04363
dialogue.text: Sleep... I need sleep...

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: How can they close the Archeion? I mean, really...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: We are at an impasse. As we have no other leads, I should like to pursue this one further...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: But I doubt that our stone-faced custodian will be swayed by heartfelt pleas. We must seek another means to access the lower levels.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: 'Tis likely that the people in this area are involved in the restructuring in one way or another. If we were to ingratiate ourselves, they might allow us to accompany them on the lift.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Let us ask around. Surely someone is in need of a few strong backs to lighten the load.

dialogue.name: TIREDSTAFF04363
dialogue.text: What's that? Take you down on the lift with me? Sorry, but not a chance. I've been up and down all day, and only now have I finally found a spare moment to rest.

dialogue.name: TIREDSTAFF04363
dialogue.text: I did see a gleaner fellow heading out the gate there, though. Shouldering a large pack─engaged in some manner of task. Maybe he'll be headed down below after he's done with...whatever it is he's doing.

dialogue.name: TIREDSTAFF04363
dialogue.text: Please, even talking is an effort. Go and bother that gleaner I told you about...

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: Am I taking the lift? Oh, no, we're just students. They won't let us into the Archeion, even though we found...

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: ...Actually, we have no idea what it is we found─there's no record of such a creature anywhere. But it was wandering around Tranquility, and so we thought to donate it to the vaults.

dialogue.name: GIANTBEAVER04363
dialogue.text: (-Muffled Voice-)<squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: Oddest little squeal, don't you think? Anyway, I suppose we'll have to take care of it until the Archeion is open again.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: At first we thought it might have escaped from one of the research laboratories, but when we reported our find to the Studium, they were just as dumbfounded as we were...

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDSTUDENT04363
dialogue.text: If it truly is a newly discovered species, we could have our names appear in a gazette!

dialogue.name: GIANTBEAVER04363
dialogue.text: (-Muffled Voice-)<squeal> <squeal> <squeal>

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: Quiet. You'll frighten it away.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: ...Ah, it's you again. I don't mean to be rude, but I'm in the middle of another task. The cloudkin I need to capture is close. Very close.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: Hm? You wish to help me with this, too? You spend your time in unusual ways, my friend.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: Still, two hunters are generally better than one. Very well.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: The canal here is a common gathering spot for birds of all kinds, but the one I'm after today is the hornbill.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: Its feathers are green, and its cry a distinctive “caw.” Single it out and shoot it with this sleeping dart.

dialogue.name: ERENVILLE
dialogue.text: The effects are short-lived, so I'll lie in wait down by the riverbank to claim our quarry. Be sure to hit the right one!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search your surroundings for the hornbill. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the hornbill and use the blowgun with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I took a quick peek inside, but it's awfully dark in there...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Medial Circuit which Erenville mentioned is the tier directly below us.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Unlike the lowest level of Labyrinthos with its rigid security, one can usually roam the middle layer quite freely. Let us see what we might find.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I never would've noticed this cave on my own! Thank the Scholar that Erenville knew of it...and that you were there to persuade him to share.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This must be it─the entrance to the mineshaft.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: 'Tis faint, but I hear something moving within... Creatures homed there by the researchers, you think?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, slavering beasts aside, we will need to watch our footing. We should tighten our straps and such before we continue.
